Package fko.chessly.game

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GameBoard
    Interface for a Chessly board.
    GameMove
    This interface describes a move in Chessly.
    GamePiece  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Game  
    GameBoardImpl
    The board class has all the information regarding an actual current Chessly board like stones the fields, who is next player, etc..
    GameClock
    A simple clock for timed reversi games
    GameMoveImpl
    A class representing a move in a Chessly game.
    GameMoveList  
    GamePosition
    Simply and lightwight class for x and Y coordinates.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    GameColor

    The ChesslyColor class represents the two colors of a Chessly game and a special color for empty fields (NONE).
    GamePieceType  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    IllegalMoveException
    Thrown to indicate that we tried to use an illegal move in a context where this is not allowed.
